name: Currency Exchange for WooCommerce
author: BeRocket

sections.description:
WooCommerce currency exchange for your shop. You can easily setup exchange to any currencies in WooCommerce. Visual only exchange replaces price in shop, product page, but still uses WooCommerce default currency for order page and checkout page. Full currency exchange replaces price at all, also orders will be saved with selected currency. You can setup widget or shortcode with images for each currency. Currency exchange rates can be downloaded from Open Exchange Rates and automatically updated every 24 hours.

New Features in Version 3.5.1:

✅ Floating Bar for the widget type. It will be fixed on the right side of your site.

Features:

✅ Currency exchange for all WooCommerce currencies
✅ Visual exchange for WooCommerce shop and product page only
✅ Full exchange for shop, product page and orders
✅ Widget and shortcode with same settings
✅ Drop down menu and radio buttons in widget
✅ Custom exchange rates for currencies
✅ MasterCard support

Features in Version 3.5:

✅ Open Exchange Rates support
✅ CurrencyLayer support
✅ Auto update currency every 24 hours
✅ Detect currency via IP address
✅ User can set currency in account settings
✅ Custom element position for currency label in widgets
✅ Country flag for currency label
✅ Custom image for currency label
✅ Multiplier for exchanged currencies

Plugin Links:

Demo 1
Demo 2
Docs

Plugin video

Compatibility with WooCommerce plugins

Currency Exchange for WooCommerce has been tested and compatibility is certain with the following WooCommerce plugins that you can add to your site:

🔸 Advanced AJAX Product Filters
🔸 Load More Products for WooCommerce
🔸 Grid/List View for WooCommerce
🔸 Min and Max Quantity for WooCommerce
🔸 Product Preview for WooCommerce
🔸 Products Compare for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
Important: First of all, you have to download and activate WooCommerce plugin, because without it Currency Exchange for WooCommerce cannot work.

  1. Unzip the downloaded .zip file.
  2. Upload the Currency Exchange for WooCommerce folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Currency Exchange for WooCommerce from Plugins page

Configuration

Currency Exchange for WooCommerce will add a new sub-menu item called “Currency Exchange” in “WooCommerce” menu. There you will be able to access plugin settings page.
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with all WordPress themes?

Compatibility with all themes is impossible, because they are too many, but generally if themes are developed according to WordPress and WooCommerce guidelines, BeRocket plugins are compatible with them.

How can I get support if my WooCommerce plugin is not working?

If you have problems with our plugins or something is not working as it should, first follow this preliminary steps:

  • Test the plugin with a WordPress default theme, to be sure that the error is not caused by the theme you are currently using.
  • Deactivate all plugins you are using and check if the problem is still occurring.
  • Ensure that your plugin version, your theme version and your WordPress and WooCommerce version (if required) are updated and that the problem you are experiencing has not already been solved in a later plugin update.

If none of the previous listed actions helps you solve the problem, then, submit a ticket in the forum and describe your problem accurately, specify WordPress and WooCommerce versions you are using and any other information that might help us solve your problem as quickly as possible. Thanks!

sections.reviews:
This is easy to configure.

By niguramu on February 20, 2024

I was looking for an AJAX currency converter plugin. This is great because it's easy to set up.

However, only when using Cloudflare Edge Cache, the widget's currency converter does not seem to work. It would be nice if there was some solution.

The best multi-currency plugin

By Ajuara SEO (ajuaraseo) on July 19, 2023

The best of its kind, even in the free version. I have tried many multi-currency plugins, and this one is simple, intuitive, efficient and without the gimmicks you find in other multi-currency plugins once you have installed them. For example, it integrates very well with Open Exchange Rates, without having to contract payment APIs later.

Great Plugin

By dan009 on July 16, 2023

Used it at checkout page for multiple currencies. Does a pretty well job.

Well done.

perfect

By lupizi on March 5, 2023

perfect

Works fine, free and the best.

By kirgizmustafa17 on May 18, 2022

Thank you so much.

This is the best plugin I've ever used

By mkridwan on September 30, 2021

This is the best plugin I've ever used

Awesome experience

By abdulrehmanbinaltaf on September 7, 2021

Awesome experience, good to use with the paypal as set the base currency in $ and you are free to display any currency on store ie based on IP / location

Seems like a very good plugin but widget looks terrible

By marguy1 on July 4, 2021

I used the plugin for a few hours and it seems to be working very well. However its widget on the website looks really bad. First, it's not aligned with the rest of the page elements. Second, its width changes when you change currencies. Finally, its drop down menu items look bad. The previous plugin I was using (Multi Currency for WooCommerce) is the opposite, it doesn't work very well but it looks awesome.

Muy bueno

By kevin140797 on June 18, 2021

Justo lo que necesitaba, pagos en una sola moneda y precios de referencia en muchas monedas

Love it!

By uderiu on March 7, 2021

It's just great!
